transcript:
Customer: Allah tera ehsan hai.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Assalam Walekum bhai good morning.

Customer: Good morning.

Executive: Pranjal baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se account manager aapka.

Customer: Haan ji bolo.

Executive: Sir jo aapka concern tha na uske regarding maine kal aapke team se connect kiya tha. To wo jo initial period tha unhone bataya ki jab kafi time jab naya account host hota hai na to usme mahine bhar ke andar time hota hai agar aapko business nahi milta hai to refund kara sakte the.

Executive: To us time unhone commit kiya tha sir refund ke liye. Abhi refund ka to nahi possible hai agar aap chahoge to mere paas ek option hai ki jo bhi aapka remaining amount hai usko maximizer nahi chalana koi baat nahi basic service mein convert karwa deta hu main. Ye kar sakte hain sir.

Customer: Kaunsa? Ye dekho kaunsa ho?

Executive: Ji?

Customer: Kaunsa bol rahe ho aap kaunsa package?

Executive: MDC MDC service basic service.

Customer: Achcha basic service wo 33 wala?

Executive: Haan us pe convert ho jayega aapka. To jitna bhi amount rahega uske duration ke according.

Customer: Kitna katega wo usme yaar mujhe bata de ek baar.

Executive: Sir usme aapka jo abhi amount hamare paas bacha hua hai.

(silence)

Executive: Sir abhi aapka hamare paas jo amount bacha hua hai na wo ₹40000 hai. Thik hai?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Thik hai to jo ₹40000 bacha hua hai to isme se jo MDC yahan se aaj ki date se matlab jo adjust hoga na abhi tak jo service aapka chala aaj se ek saal ka MDC yahan se badh jayega aapka.

Customer: Hmm. Kitna dega wo?

Executive: Aapko kuch nahi dena padega.

Customer: Kitna? Kitne ka hai wo MDC?

Executive: ₹32000 plus GST hai sir ₹38000 kuch lagte hain.

Customer: ₹2000 bachenge?

Executive: Haan ji?

Customer: ₹2000 bachenge?

Executive: Haan sir isme ek option aata hai jaise ya to ₹2000 jaise ki bachenge to isme to usme ye lapse ho jata hai ya to aap jaise ki upper mein upgrade karaenge to do saal mein jaye. To usme wo hota hai ye do option hota hai agar do saal mein karaoge to kuch amount aapko dena padega to ab wo hoga nahi isliye kam mein matlab jo hota hai na ya to exact amount hai.

Customer: Bola tha mujhe us time bhi bola tha fir do mahine pehle kaise de rahe the mujhe ye samajh nahi aa raha refund.

Executive: Sir jo hota kya hai jab naya account host hota hai na 30 days ke andar.

Customer: Bola tha ek ek 30 days ka the.

Executive: Matlab four month ho gaye the mujhe.

Executive: Ye four month nahi hua tha maine unse baat kari sir wo 60 days hota hai na 60 days ke andar agar aapko naya ka kuch dikat.

Customer: Sir mujhe pata hai yaar main bhi khud abhi matlab.

Executive: Sir mere se aapki bhalai mere pocket se thodi na ja raha main kyu nahi chahunga agar jo option tha maine discuss karke aapko bataya agar mera usme mera.

Customer: Itna itna bekar kaise ho gaya ye IndiaMART matlab itna farzi ho gaya hai matlab raddi.

Executive: Dekhiye bekar nahi hua raddi nahi sir aap khud sochiye jab aap jab aap jab aap do saal use kar rahe the aap jab do saal use kar rahe the to Makrana se kitne log the aap ye bataye. Kuch nahi the Makrana se Makrana se koi.

Customer: Saale wo matlab pura mamla kharab kar diya yahan pe pura.

Executive: Aap ye bataye Makrana se Makrana se to zyada se zyada TrustSeal chalata tha TrustSeal chalata tha bahut zyada Makrana se koi star leader chala raha tha aaj dekhiye wahi staro leader hai.

Customer: Starting mein us time hamare the matlab 30 40 50 jane only bas khali 2022 mein.

Executive: Sir aaj to Makrana se hi itne log hain ki kya kya hi batau aapko aur main baat hai ki.

Customer: Mujhe pata hai itna to.

Executive: Haan aur dusri cheez hai kharab kuch nahi hai usko competition sabko business chahiye to sabne register kara liya to competition.

Customer: Kuch nahi ka yaar ek ek to aana chahiye kam se kam lead hi nahi aa rahi kya kare iska competition.

Executive: Lead aati hai baat to hai second mein second mode ab abhi kabhi aapne reservation kiya sir Indian railway mein. Ticket liya train ka tatkal ticket.

Customer: Haan tatkal ticket.

Executive: Tatkal ticket ticket khulti hai window AC ticket.

Customer: Abhi abhi meri baat sun lijiye main samajh gaya aap suniye AC ka sir AC ka sir 10 baje khulta hai aap ek minute lagega khologe daloge ek minute ke andar ticket sab khali ho jate hain.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Booking nahi hota tatkal sir same wahi haal hai aap samjhe na aap keh denge ki ticket nahi mil rahi tatkal government de rahi hai na jiska book ho gaya utne mein ho gaya wahi same isme.

Customer: Ab ab meri baat suno.

Executive: Chalo ek ek din maan liya do din maan liya ek month ho gaya do month ho gaya char month ho gaya payment ho gaya six month se ek ticket hi nahi milega mujhe aap laptop se use kar rahe hain aap laptop se use kar rahe hain ye bataye pehle.

Customer: Main mobile se use karta hu.

Executive: Aaj ke time pe nahi mobile se lead uthegi kyunki mobile ka real time nahi aata aapke paas system hoga jab website wala kholenge na website mode aap us pe auto refresher dalenge jab auto refresh hoga lead to usme se aap jab karoge to ek do lead uth jayegi usme se ye main aapko us din bhi bataya tha jab pehli baar connect hua tha ki abhi itna competition ki wajah se mobile.

Customer: Iska kharcha aur kare laptop ka.

Executive: Main ek baat bata raha hu sir ab dekhiye usually kya business sab run kar rahe ho accounts wagera maintain rakhte hoge to laptop to usually log rakhte hi hain sari cheeze details wagera excel wagera to business ka aap apne banate hi rahoge to koi extra nahi kar sakte.

Customer: To unhone bola hai ek baar main ek baar baat karta hu unse ek baar mujhe mere paas number the unke matlab.

Executive: Sir aap aap ek baar kar lijiye varna baat yahi option hai jo tha maine de diya agar wo hota to main de deta aapko mera usme koi loss nahi tha jo aap soch rahe hain.

Customer: Nahi nahi ek baar unse unse baat kar lu ek baar main ek baar.

Executive: Haan aap ek baar kar lijiye. Kya naam hai unka naam bhul gaya main yaar. Delhi ke aage ye apna kya naam hai uska Noida ke andar hi hai apna wahan haan so mere bande ko ek wahan pe wo sab batayega wahan pe.

Customer: Usko hi bhejunga unhone un usne baat ki thi pehle bhi ki yaar kabhi bhi tu mera kaam nahi aaya to refund kabhi bhi le lena aur mera isme budget bhi nahi tha fir bhi maine aisi taisi karke maine isme liya hai 76 80000 ka mera package badh gaya mera budget tha 33000 ka.

Executive: Haan. Sir yahi ho sakta hai ki jo bacha hua aapka 40000 main isko adjust kar sakta hu usme 38000 ka aa raha hai package MDC mane aaj se ek saal aapka chalega yahi ek option hai sir. Agar aap chahoge aap usi mein ho payega sir haan MDC mane aapka ho jayega isme ek saal yahan se ek saal service aapki 2026 ke last tak chalegi. Ek saal ki aapki thi.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Kaise agar dekhoge to aapne service jo li thi na.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer complains about not getting buyleads.

- Customer says IndiaMART has become fake.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund is not possible now.

- Executive offered to convert remaining amount to basic service.

- Executive explained about MDC service.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to someone about the refund.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, buyleads, mdc
